php.LBL_NAME: Company name or first and last name
php.LBL_CONDITIONS_OF_REGISTRATION:
All data below must be true, it is an obligatory condition of registering the product that results from the license terms.  %s 
In the registration, there should be all entities involved in the implementation of the CRM system, e.g. "Target user" should always be filled in with the data of an entity that uses this system. The "Supplier" entry type must exist when an entity implementing CRM is different from the one that uses it. The "Integrator" entry type must exist when integration with a CRM system was performed and the data of the entity that integrated the system needs to be submitted.
In order for the system to correctly verify the registration key, Cron must be active and function properly. 

The validity of data submitted during registration is verified manually within 72h. Providing any false data will cause the entire registration to be declined. Thank you for your patience.
%s
php.LBL_TYPE_INFO:
- end user - an entity that uses the CRM system 
- provider - an entity that implements a CRM system for another entity that will use it 
- integrator - an entity that integrates the CRM system

 NOTE: If you are a provider/integrator and you want to register the CRM on behalf of your client, remember that both entities must be registered - you as a vendor/integrator and your client as an end user.
php.LBL_CHANGING_ENTITY_NAME: Each change in the entity's information requires re-registration.
php.LBL_COMPANYSIZE: The number of employees employed by the entity
php.LBL_WEBSITE_INFO: Enter the entity's website or a personal website. DO NOT enter the URL where your CRM is installed.
php.LBL_VAT_ID_INFO:
In case of companies, provide unique tax identifier applicable in the country, for example TAX ID: PL1180002425
In case of private persons, provide a unique identifier assigned on the day of birth, for example:  PESEL: 01234567890
php.LBL_NEWSLETTER_ALERT: Entering fake data will cause the registration to be denied. In order to remove the data such as Name, Surname, E-mail from the newsletter, uncheck the field Newsletter
php.LBL_EMAIL_NEWSLETTER_INFO:
Inscreva-se no Boletim informativo gratuito do YetiForce. Mantenha-se informado sobre as últimas atualizações do sistema, e as novidades do setor de CRM. Enviaremos informações sobre novas versões, atualizações, eventos, novos recursos do sistema e muito mais.
Junte-se a nossa comunidade e mantenha-se atualizado.
Conexão de internet é necessário para se inscrever.
php.LBL_LAST_SCAN_DATE: Data da última verificação do status da inscrição
php.LBL_LAST_SCAN_ERROR:
Ainda não foi verificada a situação de registo:
- O CRM não tem acesso à Internet,
- O Cron não funciona ou há erros no seu funcionamento,
- Erros na configuração do servidor
php.LBL_BRAND_DATA_INFO: Bloqueio usado quando YetiForce Branding é comprada permite que você insira dados personalizados visíveis no rodapé.
php.LBL_SYSTEM_NOT_REGISTERED: O sistema YetiForce não foi registrado adequadamente ou os dados fornecidos estão incorretos.
php.LBL_PAID_FN_NO_SUBSCRIPTION: As funcionalidades pagas foram habilitadas no sistema %s, por favor adquira uma assinatura.
